Experience

Research Intern, Machine Learning and Perception Lab

Prior works on embodied tasks such as PointGoal Navigation or ObjectGoal Navigation have primarily focused on training agents via reinforcement learning (either from scratch or with partially trained submodules). Although these approaches achieve commendable success, they necessitate carefully-designed dense reward functions. In this work, we ask (and attempt to answer) the question -- how well does behavior cloning scale for tasks such as ObjectGoal Navigation and Object Rearrangement.

(June 2020 - July 2021)
